body: STD in Edo Period, gudluck lil gurl

Some people enjoy the plot ya know, plus i mean at least some of these aren't as bad as regular porn's plot
@robot hentai that is true! I mostly also read them for the plot and story, because you don't get that in a normal porn.

If you think this here is fucked up you haven't seen any of the really crazy stuff  on this site.
The story is bittersweet if anything. Some of you are blowing this way out of proportion. 
That aside, yobai (night crawling) wasn't just some giant gang rape practice.
It was a way for the girls and boys in a village to make their first sexual experiences among other things. This way girls also could reject boys advances without those losing face publicly.
It also served as a prelude to marriages, or start of a public relationship. (Parents would on purpose "not notice" the intruder for some times until they finally "catch" the couple in the act and from there on they can officially become a thing.)
Funnily enough in some regions yobai was only allowed with married women or widows.
Sure, it probably wasn't all sunshine and roses that happened, but there are enough abusive or bad relationships and things that happen in "modern" society as well

I think most people who read hentai want at least a bit of plot.
If not, there are hentai images or porn

@sjackson you kidding?if you want to see vaginas just go to google images. most hentais doesn't have deep and well constructed histories, yes, but usually they have some sort of plot that differentiates them from regular porn.
